categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Diu Sofla was a female Human agent of the Imperial Intelligence of the Sith Empire who visited the town of Raider's Cove on Rishi during the Galactic War.
Diu Sofla appears as an Imperial Agent trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
